page.title: 11Education in Carnetown
page.content: In our block there are 3{primary {schools}and one{comprehensive.There {are 1377 children in all four {schools,477 in the primary schools {and 900 in the comprhensive.In all {schools except one the numbers are {falling. In this one the new Welsh {Unit is expanding as more parents ask {for welsh Education.Two of the schools {were built in the 1980'S.one in 1958 {and the comp. is a new building.There {are two Adult Education Centres but {only one of them is open because the {council cannot afford to staff them {both. FAMOUS PEOPLE Tom Jones,Dai Dower,Stuart Burrows,Merlyn Rees,and Sir Geraint Evans were pupils at schools that were amalgamated to make the comprehensive school.
